name: Neutral-Grip Flat Bench Press (Dumbbells)
cues: Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other (neutral grip)
Lower the dumbbells slowly to chest level, keeping elbows at about a 45Â° angle
Pause briefly at the bottom before pressing back up to full extension
Keep your feet planted and core braced throughout
Start with a moderate weight and focus on control
Keep wrists straight and avoid letting them bend backward
Do not bounce the weights off your chest
Use a spotter if lifting heavy
